pages.title: Activators
pages.text: Active totems need activators. Activators are what determines what triggers a totem. These range from right clicking on unsuspecting mobs, falling into lava or dying. Activators can also be combined, so both activators will trigger the totem.$(br2)Each activator has a unique item needed for it's crafting. This item needs to be combined with an active totem.
with an active totem. See Category 4 - Activators for a list of all the activators and their recipes.
